explains: adj. 未满足的，未实现的；壮志未酬的

sentences.en: Do you have any unfulfilled ambitions?
You must let go of the idea that to be single is to be unhappy and unfulfilled.
sentences.cn: 你必须放弃单身就不快乐不满足的想法。

sentences.en: If some wish remains unfulfilled we must show our confidence in Him, for he knows best.
sentences.cn: 如果有些愿望还没有实现，我们必须对他表示信任，因为他知道得最清楚。
